item.title: Dan add a quote by Robert M. Pirsig
item.description: "Who really can face the future? All you can do is project from the past, even when the past shows that such projections are often wrong. And who really can forget the past? What else is there to know?" -- Robert M. Pirsig

item.title: Dan add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Sometimes you just have to pee in the sink." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Dan add a quote by Richard Feynmann
item.description: "Study hard what interests you the most in the most undisciplined, irreverent and original manner possible." -- Richard Feynmann

item.title: Dan add a quote by Richard P. Feynman
item.description: "I learned very early the difference between knowing the name of something and knowing something." -- Richard P. Feynman

item.title: Dan add a quote by Richard P. Feynman
item.description: "Physics isn't the most important thing. Love is." -- Richard P. Feynman

item.title: Dan add a quote by Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
item.description: "Nothing great in the world was accomplished without passion." -- Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

item.title: Dan add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Dan add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "One day I will find the right words, and they will be simple." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Dan add a quote by Allen Ginsberg
Dan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "In heaven, all the interesting people are missing." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Dan add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "If it's worth doing, it's worth overdoing." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Dan add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "The degree of civilization in a society can be judged by entering its prisons." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: Dan add a quote by Antonin Artaud
item.description: "There is in every madman a misunderstood genius whose idea shining in his head frightened people and for whom delirium was the only solution to the strangulation that life had prepared for him." -- Antonin Artaud

item.title: Dan add a quote by Ken Kesey
item.description: "He Who Marches Out Of Step Hears Another Drum" -- Ken Kesey

item.title: Dan add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Dan add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "A sense of humor...is superior to any religion so far devised." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Dan add a quote by Lenny Bruce
item.description: "If Jesus had been killed twenty years ago, Catholic school children would be wearing little electric chairs around their necks instead of crosses." -- Lenny Bruce

item.title: Dan add a quote by Douglas Adams
